text: Dieter Gunther Bohlen is a German musician, born on 7 February 1954. He was born in Berne, Lower Saxony. He was a member of Modern Talking, but now appears in the TV programme "Germany Searches for a Superstar" , which is the German version of Pop Idol and American Idol. == Other websites == * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Entertainers from Lower Saxony Category:German pop musicians Category:Modern Talking Category:German television personalities
title: Dieter Bohlen
